Harvest.name: Harvest Tile
Harvest.summary: Generates Nature Essence per adjacent Grove; expands Nature capacity.
details: Nature Essence: +1 per adjacent Grove each turn.
Harvest clusters grant +10 Nature capacity per tile.

Build.name: Build Tile
Build.summary: Produces Earth Essence and provides structure for adjacent systems.
details: Supports Refine and Guard tiles that are adjacent.

Refine.name: Refine Tile
Refine.summary: Condenses Nature and Earth Essence into Water Essence when linked.
details: Water Essence: +1 each turn if adjacent to Nature and Earth producers.
Refine clusters double Water Essence output.

Storage.name: Storage Tile
details: Adds +5 capacity to each adjacent Harvest, Build, or Refine tile.
Storage tiles do not generate Essence on their own.

Guard.name: Guard Tile
Guard.summary: Hosts Sprouts who defend nearby hexes.
details: Base Sprout capacity: 5 Sprouts per Guard tile.
Battles trigger within a 3-hex radius (not yet implemented).

Upgrade.name: Upgrade Tile
Upgrade.summary: Forges items for Sprouts over time.
details: Creates combat items on a timer (systems stubbed in the prototype).

Chanting.name: Chanting Tile
Chanting.summary: Builds rituals that unleash powerful one-time spells.
details: Generates ritual progress toward a spell (effects stubbed in the prototype).
